topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b59d2a636872342c000a09#post_55b59d2a636872342c000a09
According to who? I don't watch the news any more because it causes me... it hurts me. It hurts me deeply. Especially during election season.

At any rate, it is too early to make these calls I think. Yes a lot of people have Trump on the brain now because the fuck stain has no filter between his brain and his mouth, but I don't rate his actual chances once debates and shit get started because the guy's a fucking moron. He'll embarrass himself in the debates and then we'll have a republican nominee that doesn't cause me to hate vomit blood.

Please, I need to believe this. I need to because it's the only chance for me to stave off the inevitable mental breakdown and alcoholism that comes to me with the presidential race.
